history.proof: intros x. qsimpl use: opp_mult_l. qsimpl use: opp_mult_l,Ring. scongruence use: mult_one_l.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of opp_mult_l (opp (mult _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
Unable to find an instance for the variable m.
In environment K : Ring H0 : forall x y : K, opp (mult x y) = mult (opp x) y x : K Unable to unify "mult (opp one) x" with "opp x".

original: intros x. rewrite opp_mult_l. rewrite <- Ring.ax2. reflexivity.
